name: Shadowed Forest
description: A dense forest full of hiding places but hard to navigate.

name: Sunscorched Desert
description: Blistering heat drains your energy quickly.

name: Crystal Lake
description: Cool waters and calming sounds â€” a good place to catch your breath.

name: Abandoned Village
description: Empty homes and scavenged supplies offer opportunity.

name: Rocky Cliffside
description: Dangerous terrain, but great for ambushes.

name: Volcanic Field
description: Smoldering rocks and sulfurous air... you probably shouldn't be here.

name: Moonlit Glade
description: A serene clearing touched by moonlight. Something about it feels... safe.

name: Ruined Bunker
description: Dusty concrete halls still hold some supplies, if you're lucky.
